== Installation ==
=== Instructions ===

http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2168999

=== Link to image ===

https://sourceforge.net/projects/ubuntutouch/files/saucy

== Known issues ==

Sound doesn't work with newer ubuntu images.

Device fails to boot after rebooting from Ubuntu Touch (stuck on Samsung logo). How to resolve:

1. add this line at the end of /etc/fstab: "/system /var/lib/lxc/android/rootfs/system auto ro,bind 0 0"

2. reboot

3. copy /var/lib/lxc/android/rootfs/init.rc to /var/lib/lxc/android/overrides/

4. modify "class late_start" to "class main" under "service sensorservice /system/bin/sensorservice" (it's located near the end)

5. reboot
